data:
Job Title: React Developer
Link: [Here](https://in.indeed.com/rc/clk?jk=3f07cc55faa5e21b&bb=liWQGWnXTRaot5yBBdh32mFh4JHxzsAS5jVCQk4BVMGq7coP203AgK-2xRW5nrjHxipbk4dZuxA3blxzlP2dGeN2L8w47KTyOYfPVByLyn9ag-RoDEXxWA%3D%3D&xkcb=SoDL67M3CRSFRoxGop0fbzkdCdPP&fccid=dd616958bd9ddc12&vjs=3)


Responsibilities: As a React Developer at RedBeryl Tech Solution, you will be joining the front-end development team. Your primary responsibilities will include developing and implementing user interface components using React.js concepts and workflows such as Redux and Flux. You will also be expected to work with other technologies such as JavaScript, Prime-React, Bootstrap, and React Native.
